struct.name: AntInteraction
struct.brief: Defines an interaction between two Ants

field.name: IDs
field.brief: The IDs of the two fort::myrmidon::Ant. Always reports `IDs.first <

field.name: Types
field.brief: Reports the the virtual shape body part that were in contact

type.name: std::vector<std::pair<unsigned int, unsigned int>, std::allocator<std::pair<unsigned int, unsigned int> > >

field.name: Trajectories
field.brief: Reports the fort::myrmidon::AntTrajectory of each Ant during the
field.doc: interaction. The Trajectory are truncated to the interaction.

field.name: Start
field.brief: Reports the fort::myrmidon::Time the interaction starts

field.name: End
field.brief: Reports the fort::myrmidon::Time the interaction ends

typedef.name: ConstPtr
typedef.brief: A pointer to the interaction structure
